title: Lerna Projen
description: This is a library to use manage mono repositories using projen.

title: Axios Error Redact
description: Library to redact sensitive information from Axios errors. This can be used as an response interceptor for axios instances, or can be used standalone.

title: Deployable Typescript AWS CDK App Projen Project
description: Inspired by projen This is a projen project for typescript AWS CDK Applications deployed via github actions.

title: Check Deployed Environment GitHub action
description: This github action checks if a given commit is the active deployment on a given environment in GitHub

title: AWS Local UI
description: This is a UI to look into the AWS resources created in LocalStack and aimed to be used for developers. This project is inspired by LocalStack

title: Markr
description:
API to ingest & process test results. The application has following capabilities.

Import Data
This application will consume specific format of XML in order to import test result taken for a given student in a given test. The application is very strict with the payload and if there is any part of payload does not comply with the expected structure, the whole payload will be ignored. Tha API is capable of processing same payload multiple times and this will not result in duplicate records.

Aggregate Data for reporting
The application is capable of reporting the aggregate result for a given test. Since this is a frequent request the aggregate data have been precalculated for better user experience.

title: Job Board
description:
The Application is parsing a list of jobs and applicants from a remote server in csv format and render it in a page.

The application will load the CSV file only at start-up and stores it in a relational database. (assumption: applicant names are unique).
Users is able to view a list of jobs with title, location and date.
Users is able to click on a job to view more details about it.

title: QuizApp
description:
React application that allows te user to choose the set of questions to answer.
The questions might have single or multiple answer.
The answers will be shuffled every time.
When user is finished answering the question they get the result and will calculate if passed based on the pass mark.

title: Earthquake GeoJSON details
description:
This small project retrieves the summary of earthquake recorded form USGS.
This API implemented using GraphQL in order to respond to the request based on the details required.
